website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive multi-piece set with a good value price.
pros: Lightweight with inline skate wheels for smooth sailing
Retractable push-button handles on the larger two pieces aid maneuverability and can be stored neatly when not in use
Corners are reinforced for added durability
cons: Wheels do not swivel as some users would prefer

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: This set was more then sufficient to get my wife to Canada for a 10 day vacation. No issues fitting into the new size requirements for the airlines. All our old luggage was one to two inches over the new sizing. Very cost effective also.
customer_reviews.author: William Reever

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Pretty fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE JUST CAME BACK FROM VACATION. ROADTRIP ON THE EAST COAST OF THE US, survived with extra extra extra weight. Arrived 10 minutes ago. Looks just as described (I'm adding pictures). So far so good! Pretty fast shipping. They're not the best quality you could get but they're good for the price. Gonna update after traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Flor H

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set of Luggage at a Nice Price.
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of different luggage sets before deciding on this one. I was afraid that the quality might not be as good as others that cost more, but I was very well pleased with it. Both uprights are large enough but not too large and the small shoulder bag is actually large enough to put a weekend of clothing into. The material is heavy and it rolls very well.
customer_reviews.author: JaniceBTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Considering that this is a full set of luggage for around $60, I thought it was a steal. The largest bag was a little smaller than I was expecting, but still large enough to hold my stuff. I haven't used them enough to see how well they hold up, but they seem sturdy so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never again. Worst purchase I ever made.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are pretty cheap in material and the largest bag arrived with the frame bent out of shape. The smaller bag's strap was ripped and it looked as if a mouse chewed through it. The medium size bag seemed to be fine. Had to wait until after my trip to write this review but I will never purchase for American Tourister again. I've actually went and purchased another set of bags from a different company and gave these bags to a family member. Invest in better quality and you will surely be pleased with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Luggage
customer_reviews.text: The cancer causing material warning is disconcerting and it did have a strong chemical smell when it first arrived. I wish I didn't live in the city and could have aired it out outside. But, otherwise, the quality seems good and the purple set I ordered is true to the picture. I saw no defects. For around 50 dollars it seems worth it. I'll update this if I notice anything wrong with it early on when traveling. Update 10-7-18: This set has been through several airports for two long trips now. Nothing has broken, but the material did get a scuff on the back from rough handling at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Either of the 2 luggages holds enough for a good amount of clothes and some extra things. Like things you get on the trip. Very light weight and perfect bargain for you money. The carry on bag is a nice size two fitting a days worth of clothes maybe two and extra things like chargers and wallet.
customer_reviews.author: nhuntley

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So I dont know what all the complaints are about. Plain and simply, for the price, these are great for occasional travels. Yeah there are a few stray strings here and there, small strings at that. This set of luggage will arrive their purpose. Zippers are smooth, wheels are smooth, and handles extend smoothly. If you're looking for luggage that won't break the bank, this is the way to go. The purple even separates your luggage from all the normal black luggage.
customer_reviews.author: C. PAYTON

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for both road travel, and multiple flights since purchased. They are excellent! Good quality, sturdy and hold up well to the abuse luggage gets during air travel, the zipper are smooth and don't snag or stick, pockets are large. I'd buy these again without hesitation. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: 3MessyMonkeys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, nothing broke while my two young boys were running around pulling them. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Cannot reinsert middle baggage handle
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with our luggage, except that the handle on our middle size luggage would not reinsert after our second flight. Hence, it was very awkward in stacking the luggage in the car, for the trip home, and see no use for it for future travel. We tried several ways to close the handle to closed set position, but it would only go about six or so inches. It will be awkward to return for replacement, because of not being able to shut the handle.. Would like suggestions on how to replace. Otherwise, if handle worked, our evaluation for the set is 5 Star because it travels very well on the built-in rollers.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold up to luggage handlers, but good for personal use
customer_reviews.text: This set comes as described. The pieces are good enough, but I'm not confident that they would survive going through airports or cargo ports without being torn up. The interior has only flimsy plastic to reinforce the fabric. I've seen these easily shattered in other pieces after luggage handlers got ahold of them. If you're going to be the only one handling your luggage (ie it's not going to be thrown around), these should hold up fine. Otherwise, you might want to spring for a pricier set or you'll just be purchasing another during your trip which is even more costly than having the time to shop around.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy--dimensions do not include wheels!
customer_reviews.text: What matters for carry-on baggage is if it qualifies to be a carry-on bag. The medium size bag shows as being 21x14x7 but that does not include the wheels (and it does not specify that it does not include wheels). The size with wheels is slightly over what would be acceptable by most airlines. I would return, but unfortunately I am over the return period because I trusted the dimensions of the item I ordered. I will never buy this product line again, and I urge anyone looking to purchase to check the manufacture site to see that they now include the "overall" dimensions on their luggage--which almost always pushes their products over the carry-on dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: IzD

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: The value of the set for the sale price was excellent. These are basic suitcases that are durable for average use. I specifically bought these because they are not the spinner type suitcases. I personally find the spinners are much faster to break when traveling via air. The quality of this set is good, they are not high end, life time lasting suitcases, but for the price I expect to use them a number of times over a few years and that is good for me. I have used them twice already and they held up well. The sizes are perfect for a typical male traveler. Great buy. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: VelocityTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Worked amazingly well!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I was really worried that the luggage would fall apart given how cheap it was. Zippers worked great, the wife couldn't even pack it so full that I couldn't close it. The wheels worked great, no pulling to one side or the other, flowed nicely. The sizes, of course, were perfect, no lectures from the staff at Delta that it was too big, or too heavy, or anything. Even the color was distinct enough to easily recognize it on conveyer belts. All in all, I am extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: isfcco

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe on Flights - Busted Open
customer_reviews.text: The main suitcase did not hold up at all. The zippers were broken off during travel after the first use. Half of my items had fallen out onto the conveyor belt and some were missing entirely. I did manage to reload my suitcase and partially zip it. It didn’t hold without a zipper though. The carry-on bags held up fine but those were in my care. I definitely wouldn’t recommend these for travel that involves flying due to the roughness of some baggage handlers.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Car Bomb

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP LUGGAGE ALERT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased no more than 6mo ago and was a gift for my mom. we took a cruise and this was her 2nd time using the set....The entire side fabric is ripped and was not over packed! Ridiculous how these products dont even last 1 year!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: djginyc

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Quality Luggage
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice luggage set for a low price. I took it on a trip with me and it was durable and well put-together, all of the parts felt like good quality materials. It was roomy and fit all of my items. I was able to expand it if necessary with an extra zipper, and there were enough pockets for everything. The kids were able to pull it on the wheels with no issues. I like the purple color, as I was able to easily pick it out at baggage claim.
customer_reviews.author: 1SmartCookie

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I don't use luggage often so I didn't think an expensive set was necessary. It served it's purpose on it's first trip and seemed to hold up to everything luggage goes through at an airport. The second time I used it was on a weekend getaway. Not much was packed in the suitcase. The medium sized suit case tore in several places. It was not overstuffed or misused. It simply tore where there are seams.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable luggage
customer_reviews.text: Nice luggage for a Reasonable price. The small suitcase could have a little more room, it does not expand like the larger one. There is a good amount of room for toiletries or electronics in the carry on size bag. The suitcases are of nice quality for fifty five, I had some department store cheap ones and when full they would topple over if standing. These do not do that, so I am very pleased with the purchase. It's nice to have affordable luggage when you don't travel but maybe one a year. These are basic and I would suggest something of higher quality if used very often but for an occasional traveler these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Custom00gt

customer_reviews.title: This luggage set works super great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I took this luggage set to Mexico with us just last week, and it held up very well! The shoulder bag is the perfect size for toiletries and as a carry on bag, and the largest one is good for combining hubs and my shirts and pants, the smaller roller bag was used for under things and flip flops. It was perfect! Great price and they look good and sturdy. Had no problems with the wheels, they rolled around with us on multiple different floors, changed direction with ease, what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I thought I liked my old suitcase well enough until it finally dawned on me that my hardshell case only holds half of the available thickness. My wife had made the change a few years ago. It just took me longer. There were a lot of brands I wasn’t familiar with, American Tourister I certainly was. It was cheap, but it looks and feels cheap. I can’t imagine using this terribly long, but I will use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mangetout

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made but for $55 you can't really expect too much. The description said "fabric lining" but the only lining is a plastic like sheet that only covers the handle mechanism, the rest of the interior is NOT LINED. The luggage has a strong odor which I am hopeful will dissipate after is is left open for a while. I don't travel often, so this will probably be serviceable for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Bo in Arkansas

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I have taken two trips with the luggage so far and it has been durable. Do not over pack your suitcase though because the zipper is questionable. My last airport trip I was a little nervous coming back because my suitcase was pretty full but it stayed shut. However I won't risk it again because you could tell it was a struggle. The little suitcase works as a carry on fyi so that's great.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have to say is not a bad product because the price is really cheap for three items. So you get what you paid. The quality is good but I think it won't last to long term. I just used once and the carry on is not too big but it was really heavy, so it was a good size for me. I had to buy it fast because I was moving so is a good product if you don't want to invest too much, but if you want a long therm suitcase is better if you consider other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa L.

customer_reviews.title: Low price with high quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for a year now and waited to write my review till after I had used it for awhile. With that said this is the best investment I've made in luggage. With the low price I figured this would be a temp sweet that would wear out quickly. I WAS WRONG. This set has held up to all the mishandling of airports and cruise ships. For anybody looking for a lite weight set that will last for years, this is the set for you.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: This is the one I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from a two-week vacation using my American Tourister Fieldbrook II 2 Piece Luggage set. It fit my needs perfectly. Also, I was impressed that there is a 10-year warranty on such an economically-priced set. I'll look at American Tourister brand again if I have need of other luggage.
customer_reviews.author: H. D. Youngpeter

customer_reviews.title: Black tape! Really?
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed with this buy. I'm also offended as a customer. I don't know how they thought it was okay to sell damaged goods and advertised it as new. I have looked at only the larger one and I'm scared to open the rest.
customer_reviews.author: mona

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but strong enough.
customer_reviews.text: These are basically very light material bags with some frame and wheels. They look nice and give you extra free weight for goodies on international flights. The extender handle will bend if you put too much extra weight (other bags) on it. Mine bent back and works like new. Well worth the price you pay. If you want heavy metal bags, you can pay more and get it. This is probably not going to last forever but is a great product for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I used only the large piece of the set. During the use I found issues with the zippers. They stopped working smoothly and would be difficult to use. I was concerned they would rip, even though I was trying to be gentle and the item was packed appropriately. Also the tow handle seemed broken as it kept getting stuck and would not pull out or push in. I only got to use the piece for a short while. Was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely falling apart at the seams.
customer_reviews.text: Second time using the luggage and it's completely falling apart. Had good hopes about this set because of reviews but it goes back to the tried and true you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Willman

customer_reviews.title: Worst American Tourister suitcase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've always used American Tourister suitcases, but this set was the worst and lowest quality EVER!. The suitcase was severely damaged internally on it's first flight. On the second flight the fabric ripped, and took even more damage to the internal structure. Useless after just 2 flights!!! I would be better off using a Hefty garbage sack as luggage!! I suggest avoiding this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: DJ A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a week trip
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a week trip. I used the large one and my kid used the smaller one. The little carry-on bag was perfect for her toys and coloring books for the plane ride. We over packed yhese and yhe zippers held up nicely. The large one allows you to extend it a bit more which was noce because i had to stuff a puffy flower girl dress in it on the way home. My only wish was that it had 4 wheels but, those are a lot more so i could not do that optoon
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, great for road trips but not air travel.
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale at Christmas for $50, and for that price, it's a decent set of luggage. Mind you, it is cheaply made, but again, I got what I paid for. I've used it several times since purchasing it--road/car trips only, no airplanes, and it's done just fine, but I don't think I would use it on air travel. I don't think it would survive. The biggest complaint I have is the interior: the bottom the the suitcases are just horribly made and there is a thin bit of fabric that covers the interior. Again, I got exactly what I paid for, but it has served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Paranormalibrarian

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm impressed by this. I had my doubt cuz of the price but this luggage are great deal, they are well made, looks pretty resistance, and honestly the sizes are great. I get 3 for the price of a small one in other brand
customer_reviews.author: Genesis.Karlos

customer_reviews.title: Good for the once a year traveller
customer_reviews.text: The largest bag is expandable but the carry-on (2nd biggest) is not. These are obviously cheaply made, but the price is reasonable. If you frequently travel via airplane then you will want something more durable because the airlines tend to throw bags around a bit. If you will handle these yourself (travelling by car) and treat them gently, then they should be fine for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Durable American Tourister 4pc
customer_reviews.text: We recently did an extended road trip up the east coast (3 weeks). In and out of the SUV. In and out of the hotel. In and out of the family's condo. This luggage held up superb. I really like the weekend duffel bag roller(perfect for two night stay in Atlantic City). Purple is muted not very bright (which I like). Needless to say durable rollers, zippers and handles. American Tourister is a classic for durability.
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! This was an amazing deal. The suitcases came with all pieces intact. The largest and smallest bag has been on two trips so far. I read mixed reviews, some of which said they were not sturdy or didn’t zip properly. I’ve had neither problems so far. It’s a great bank for your buck product. Of course, like most luggage, this will probably wear out over time, but I can foresee many more trips with these bags until then.
customer_reviews.author: Adetutu Osokoya

customer_reviews.title: Good suitcases great price
customer_reviews.text: Held up well on our flight to Texas next they're heading to Florida. Good construction easy to maneuver through airports love the small bag that was my carry on
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: We used for our trip to California they were plenty durable and they were great for storing all our memorabilia from disney I would definitely recommend this product its wonderful for the price
customer_reviews.author: AmberK

customer_reviews.title: Fabric seems thin/lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the fabric is durable; but since it seemed very thin and lightweight to me, I decided to send it back. Also, I was concerned that under current airline carry on guidelines, a somewhat smaller suitcase would be required or preferable. My purchase was a set, one relatively small suitcase and tote bag.
customer_reviews.author: MaineDachshundgirl

customer_reviews.title: Value for money. If this set lasts us 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Value for money. If this set lasts us 2 international trips, its paid for itself. This is a very basic set. I got a particular color option because that had a substantial discount - this made it worth the price. My wife has taken the 25" case on an international trip and it survived all the baggage handling! So the next use is what we are hoping it will last for, any use after that is bonus value.
customer_reviews.author: Justaguy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for! The box arrived from American Tourister Imports with holes everywhere. Opened & I was so disappointed. After doing further research, realized they make "budget luggage", basically held together with cheap plastic. Awful & I returned it the same day I got it. Also, very small.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli4781

customer_reviews.title: Good For Occasional Travel
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our recent cruise. We drove to the port so they did not get to experience airport handling. They did hold up great with the handling they received from our ship's and port crew. I wish the duffel bag had a longer handle so it was easy to pull. Definitely a great buy! Probably won't last forever, as the construction doesn't seem top quality but for the price they are worth it, especially if you only travel occasionally like our family.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty darn good suit cases. Plus I love purple. The fact that you get 4 pieces in this set is awesome. I was impressed. Needed them for a little vacay to Arizona and thought heck if they surive one R/T trip I'll be happy. They surpassed my expectations!! :) Very happy with them. I'll get to use them for many years because I don't travel all that often. I read the reviews and that's why I decided to go with these. Lots of people just loved them and now I'm adding myself to mix!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Completely easy to carry or roll
customer_reviews.text: I got two weeks of clothes and two pair of shoes in the smaller roller and all my makeup and medicine in the tote carryon. Love them and they are very easy to store at home or on the trip. Leaving again for two weeks and definitely taking them again in fact I am going to considering to purchase a set to gift for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Patti Ahart

customer_reviews.title: They are fake American Tourist luggage!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for past 10 years and I know how it looks. After I opened this set, I immediately saw the differences. Outside looked almost same, but inside was poorly made. The fabric from several area was broken, the thin layer of fabric only overs the bottom and left 4 sides open. I went to Walmart and bought the same set, it looked much better and it's only $65. I have uploaded some photos for you to compare. I just realized that most of the 5 star reviews the reviewer only has 1 or a few reviews. Maybe they are fake 5 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Above exceptional value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than I expected! Purchased these for my Mother and she loves them! We had looked for a 3 piece set locally and they were much more expensive so I decided to check Amazon. Three of the 4 pieces could be used as carryon but that doesn't mean they are small. The wheels are not 360° and that's great! Our experience with the 360° wheels is they break to easily. They store packed inside each other which is space saving! The quality of the fabric is durable and tough, yet nice. Highly recommended! Not disappointed at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Bibzee

customer_reviews.title: Not for checked luggage-
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, but when I checked it at the airport, it came back and it was completely squished. The sides/frame was bent and indented. Granted this is more than likely the fault of the baggage carriers, but the framework should be built for having other heavy suitcases on top of it. (Note: the bag I checked was the 25" one) If you are using it for vehicle/bus travel where it won't be checked on an airplane and possibly put on the bottom of a bunch of other suitcases, it's fine. Otherwise, go with something that has a bit more structure.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for Old Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. I needed to replace luggage that had been purchased for me about 15 years ago due to wear and tear and mishandling by airport personnel. I would highly recommend this purchase. I was looking for three pieces, but am happy I went with the four piece; at the time of purchase, it was the cheaper option.
customer_reviews.author: A. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great Set at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: We had to fly out of state for a few days and needed something that would handle well in airport handling. Having gone through major airports like Chicago Ohara, it arrived home and we barely knew it was handled at all. Thrilled with performance, style, usability and price. It was a great deal and worthy of a 5 STAR Rating.
customer_reviews.author: SFUSA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this luggage set for a flight out of the country. It held up well to the airline tossing it about. I’ve only used it for one trip so far but for the price, it’s paid for itself already. The smaller suitcase is perfect for carry on and the smallest bag works well for the personal item to carry on. Lightweight and the suitcases are both on wheels. The smaller bag fits over the handle of either suitcase for ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyQueen

customer_reviews.title: A.T was once a trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately American tourister is not what it use to be. Before going on my trip the zipper came off, so I had to revert back to a stand by luggage that I've had for nearly twenty years. Hartman. If you do purchase this set make them a car only set, they will never survive the gorillas in baggage handling at he airport.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 peice set doesn't offer the larger case.
customer_reviews.text: Be advised. The larger bag is only available with the 3 and 4 price set. The 2 peice set only includes a medium size case and small carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn54

customer_reviews.title: Poor design on handle release latch mechanism
customer_reviews.text: The release button is plastic and will break very quickly leaving you with a handle that is locked up or down and cant be adjusted. Poor quality using plastic parts to push the release rods for the handle system. Both pieces broke after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jack White

customer_reviews.title: I was specifically shopping for luggage in the section for ...
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically shopping for luggage in the section for luggage with castors wheels. This never showed a pic of the wheels & they are NOT castor wheels that make them easier to roll them. They are also smaller than I realized. There were measurements given, but I didn't think they would be that much smaller than my old luggage. Will be buying a different set and giving this to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: We just returned from Hawaii 2 weeks ago and used this luggage for the first time for the trip. It didn't hold up well. I just ordered another brand in hard case from Amazon, hopefully they last longer than these. Horrible quality!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Luggage is pretty sturdy, it survived an international flight with no signs of wear. The suitcases are expandable and the larger pocket actually spans the entire surface area of the suitcase. The additional bag is designed to also slide through the handles and sit on top of the large suitcase. Just keep in mind that If you go with black. It will be harder to spot at the luggage claims. I got a bright neon green luggage tag to try to spot easily.
customer_reviews.author: NephilimXS

customer_reviews.title: Really Like these
customer_reviews.text: I really like these my daughte and I have used these for our trips. I should have went for the RED & Black though because when we went to get luggage on both our recent trips...it seems as though MANY people had the same taste and it was confusing for many. I learned Long ago to ALWAYS tie something onto our luggage to make it easy to spot.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Handle Too Short
customer_reviews.text: If you are a very small person this will work great for you! Would work well for a kid too. But if you are 6 foot tall forget about it. The handle that pulls out is very short and would be impossible for the average size human to pull across the airport comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: mwm9r

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality luggage set
customer_reviews.text: I needed new luggage as I’m making a move overseas. The two larger pieces are going to be exactly what I need. However the carry on is smaller than what I was expecting. I wanted to put my laptop and more expensive items in it but unfortunately not even my laptop fits. I am opting to just using my trusty school bag. Other than that no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Megill

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: These are a pretty great set. It came with 4 peices, extra large suitcase, regular size, duffle bag, and a medium sized shoulder bag. Took them on a flight and they did fine! Everyone complains about wear and tear, but loading personnel at airports aren't known for their gentle touch. Only a very small tear on the front, considering that, $70 for a set like this you can't beat the quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: courser

customer_reviews.title: Torn after one flight.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for a recent trip. I took the large bag and the duffle bag. The large bag only made it through one flight. A large area was torn in the stitching on the corner by the time I got to my hotel. I didn't trust it to make it on my return flight. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Not a Quality Set
customer_reviews.text: This product did NOT hold up at all! After first use it was already fraying. It shouldn’t have frayed at the airport. Super disappointing. And of course the cat took advantage of all the fraying so now we really can’t use it. The only thing that is good out of the set is the travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty purple set; good quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for my teenage daughter. She loves purple, and it's still easier to pick out of the airport baggage claim belt than your standard black. Nice size choices; this will be a great set for her well into her adult years! The small bag is perfect for her sleep-overs too. Holding up fine; only taken one flight so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chs88

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a long (three day) train trip, then more by car and ferry. It held up well. This is practical sturdy luggage but not luxurious. The inside is very basic. It served well even being on a rustic cabin floor for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Hanaway

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: These are great for what I needed. They are light and you get 3 and they all fit in one.. They way the airlines treat luggage now you need them made out of kevlar.I have the old very heavy samsonite. If they last for a couple of years I be happy .
customer_reviews.author: Esstk

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage for the price, doesn’t have a proper backing in the inside
customer_reviews.text: Very nice luggage for the price. I have one complaint and that is on the inside it doesn’t have an actual back separating the inside of the luggage from the backside of the mechanics...it’s just a piece of cloth velcroed in. It won’t hurt anything but that was a let down because it’s just not expected and not something nice to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: JustJesus

customer_reviews.title: Fumes from 2pc AmerTour Luggage irritated/burns eyes & nose, zipper get stuck on corners.
customer_reviews.text: 2pc AmerTour when removed from plastice bag, the smell of (possibly) pesticides is so strong, it Irritated/burns eyes & nose membrane. After opening house was saturated w/smell. Box post from China, contacting manufacturer wasn't an option. The carry-on doesn't have a drop down bottom support, items will not sit upright in carry-on. Also carry-on made of cheap/thin fabric. Quality of 21" luggage appears stronger, except, zipper get stuck when rounding corners. It gets 1star on everything, it won't post unless star is issued, zero stars. CG
customer_reviews.author: C.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: You kind of get what you pay for here. It isn't fancy, and doesn't seem super durable, but it does what it is supposed to. If you travel frequently I would say spend the money and buy something nicer, but for the occasional trip, this set works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good suitcases
customer_reviews.text: These are your average luggage suit cases. They were bought as a Christmas gift and we took our vacation a few days later. No complaints! No tears or scuffs during travel. I had cookies in my suitcase so I KNOW our suitcases definitely got thrown around. But it didn't cause any damages to the suit cases as another comment stated.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: You pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Although the product is nice and it served his purpose I was disappointed and how quickly the craftsmanship of the product started to deteriorate I've used it maybe five times within the past 6 months and already can see where from it. I recommend getting a hard shell unit without cloth
customer_reviews.author: N!

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL REPLACEMENT FOR MY OLD, USED LUBGG
customer_reviews.text: Great for my upcoming trip. I use the smaller suitcase for weekend trips; the larger one will be just right for traveling, especially the carry-on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C.

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it will be a good bag. I will know as soon as I can travel. I bought this for my cruise in November. Will update if things change. Update September 28. Went on 2 trips. So far everything is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Kunkle

customer_reviews.title: Just another cheap roller board carry on by this company
customer_reviews.text: Just a cheap roller board carry on. Size is good but doesn’t last. If you travel once a year this bag might work for you. Not impressed with the wheels, they don’t roll easy. Handle is always crooked. Material rips very easy. Spend the extra money and buy a better bag. This one will disappoint any serious traveler. Picture is after one trip.
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how much of a beating they were able to take from airport staff. They hold up except for the outer fabric. It may peel or get fuzzy but only slightly. I was able to make a few trips with them with no problems. I travel often and needed spacious bags at a good price and that's what I got with these. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: They were awesome, and I got my package today just in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of luggage for my trip. But before I could get them someone stole my package. I contacted ebags and they replaced my order. They were awesome, and I got my package today just in time for my trip. Thank you so much ebags, I really like the colors and the luggage is very sturdy. I'm recommending you to all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Alvarez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. The color is nowhere near as displayed in ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. The color is nowhere near as displayed in the product images on this listing. The purple is more of a dark plum instead of a bright violet as pictured. "It's just luggage, who cares?" Me. I ordered purple over black because I didn't want boring.
customer_reviews.author: MeganE

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight cheap feel, sent back, won't hold up on trips.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M

customer_reviews.title: Good Luggage for the Price Range
customer_reviews.text: Opened the luggage and really like this set. This is not for the extended long trip by any means,but if you plan on traveling on a budget and need a good set of luggage that is TSA lock ready.. this would work well. Sturdy and works well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Zawadi

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP! AND CHEESY!! I should have paid attention to the other reviews but I was being frugal. Arrived with a bent bar and a ripped seam. Poor stitching, threads hanging out everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage set and the color is very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Read mixed reviews about zipper issues. Have had no problems at all. Had the two larger ones and the carry on packed to the max. Great luggage set and the color is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Misty P.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage held up pretty well on a 10 day trip across the country. The larger luggage expands. I was worried that the zippers wouldn’t stay secured when we overstuffed the luggage, but they did. However, the front pouch did fray a little around the edges of the gray fabric, but I think that was just wear and tear from the handling at the airports.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for One
customer_reviews.text: This is a great luggage set for one person. I bought it for two people and we ended up having to get another large piece of luggage and the smaller pull bag and the Duffle bag stayed home. The smaller of the two pull bags seems pretty useless unless you're taking a small trip for a day or two. The wheels rolled nicely, the baggage lasted from Phoenix to Chicago and back without any damage, the largest bag has a very useful 2" gusset that allows more baggage to fit quite easily. The bag had about 35lbs of stuff in it and protected it all very well. I recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Valtyr

customer_reviews.title: Junk - Cheaply made - You're going to have to return it
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the largest case you actually pull it by broke / jammed before we even got it to the car to go to the airport. Not even fully loaded, I left room in it to bring items from our trip home. The other telescoping handle sticks and won't release after the trip so 2 out of the 3 pieces are junk. Even if is says 10 year warranty - it is not lasting 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: ShamrockMe

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is just OK. You definitely get what you pay for. They serve the purpose of a quick trip to Vegas and one of us did not have any luggage. If you are traveler and travel consistently, DO NOT buy this luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Latino Chocolate

customer_reviews.title: NO extendable handle
customer_reviews.text: The “rolling” duffel bag has wheels but no extendable handle! I’m not sure what benefit the wheels serve if I have to walk around like a zombie when pulling it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Price is good so I cannot complain in that department
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for a trip to Japan recently. I find this set functional. My only gripe is the storage space and that you cannot maximize your intended storage weight for International travel. With most international travel allowing you two luggage at 50 lbs. each and one carry on at 15 lbs. The largest bag on this set will allow you to store at most 30 lbs. So I think I need to get another larger luggage and keep the largest of the three as my second. Use the smallest one as my handcarry and the bag as my personal item. Price is good so I cannot complain in that department.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage for the money
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my husband who travels a lot, airlines are hard on luggage so I needed a good set for a good price as it really doesn't matter if you spend hundreds or not they all get abused by the airline. So far so good, heading out for his 2nd trip and still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help me move from my base in Mississippi to my new base in Virginia. For the money, it is definitely worth it. Unfortunately the airline I was traveling with had damaged the smaller luggage slightly. Just a small hole in the large front pocket. The only problem I had encountered was a balance issue when standing the luggage cases straight up but that was only due to my over packing them. They have a lot of space and had no problem packing a weeks(+) worth of clothes and other things along with it. Highly recommended by this Airman.
customer_reviews.author: Quantum_Tag

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great luggage
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great luggage. We don't travel a whole lot and this works well with our lifestyle. Love the different size of luggage options with this set. We are able to have a bathroom bag as well as options for small or large luggage accessory pieces.
customer_reviews.author: G&L

customer_reviews.title: Very decent...
customer_reviews.text: Very decent *for the low price*. I knew before ordering that this wasn't great quality, durable luggage, therefore, I'm not disappointed. For travel by car this is perfect...easy to handle and my husband and I both have separate cases. I like that! It's doubtful it could make many trips by air with rough handling.
customer_reviews.author: Spider's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for vacation. They worked well for the price. The handles do bend easily. Assumed this for the price that is why I didn't reduce the number of stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!  Perfect set for maximizing what airline allows for check-in and carry-on
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a great deal! Name brand quality at the best price! This set provided us with 2 sized for check-in, one carry-on, and one personal bag. Even better, the personal bag attatches perfectly on the wheeled carry-on. Great color purple, not just another black bag.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set. Didn't honestly expect to get quality luggage for such a low price but these were great. Managed to fit everything I needed for Dragon Con into the large suitcase and the rolling duffel. Had absolutely no issues with the bags the entire weekend. Highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Leaora

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure the recipient of this great luggage set will be incredibly happy this Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this luggage set as a gift. It arrived packaged very well. I am impressed with the quality and look of the luggage. The fact that they have wheels is a huge plus. This set includes everything you may need for travel. The interior is roomy as well. I'm sure the recipient of this great luggage set will be incredibly happy this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a joint gift for the kids and their spouses. They have all used them several times. I personally think the lining inside could be a little thicker but they seem to be holding up very nicely. I have actually borrowed them once. Durable outside and easy to move around. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TKIFC - Crawmomma

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Awesome luggage, I used two of the pieces on my recent trip to South Korea (awesome country by the way) and they worked just fine. I used the smallest bag and the smaller rolling piece and they both survived, of course, I kept the small bag with me but I checked the rolling one both coming and going and rolled it along the streets of Seoul and its still in great condition. I'm glad I bought this luggage, it was just what I needed. Here's hoping it makes through more trips in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ive travled a lot with some of the pieces including an international trip. The bags got best up really quick but they are still holding strong! For the price they are quite durable if you dont mind cosmetic issues after one trip
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for vacation they were pretty cheap compared to other luggage sets I had looked ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for vacation they were pretty cheap compared to other luggage sets I had looked at. They arrived with a slight smell so I left them all open to air out. They were just as described everything was good on them no rips or tears. They exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time

product_meta.title: American Tourister Fieldbrook II Softside Upright Luggage Set, Red/Black, 3-Piece (tote/21/25)
product_meta.description: Size:3-Piece Set (tote/21/25)| Color:Red/BlackThis American Tourister Set is made of Ultra Lightweight 600D shiny polyester construction. Rolls upright so there is no weight on your arm or shoulder, Uprights have smooth rolling in line skate Wheels for effortless mobility. Features Reinforced corners defend against the harshest travel conditions and Multiple interior and exterior Pockets keep you well organized. Push Button locking handle is designed to fit comfortably in your hand.
feature_bullets: Reinforced corners defend against the harshest travel conditions
Multiple exterior and interior pockets keep you well organized
Push Button locking handle; Inline skate wheels constructed of polyurethane with ball bearings to minimize frictional resistance, offer durability and reduced resistance for smooth rolling

Smart sleeve on tote for easy travel : Mono tube handle; Retractable, mono tube handle built into a sturdy EVA housing; Provides easy maneuverability when extended out from the case, and stores neatly inside when not in use. Locks in place in both the fully extended and stored positions for secure traveling
Product Includes: Boarding Bag 15" x 10" x 8"; 21" Upright 21" x 14" x 7"; 25" Upright 24.5" x 16" x 8"; Weight: 15.87 pounds

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars4,174 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
